name: 心理語言學
comment: 教室位於雲和街大樓2樓（地址：雲和街1號），外系及外校學生需申請門禁權限。
goals: to stimulate creative research in psycholinguistics
to design experiments to test your hypotheses
syllabus:
\- Week 1: Presentation.

\- Week 2-3: Linguistics, internal linguistics, and introduction to psycholinguistics. 

\- Weeks 4-6 (words and morphology): Word processing, the mental lexicon, lexical access, priming. 

\- Weeks 7-10 (sentences and syntax): Syntactic processing, ambiguity, sentence comprehension. 

\- Weeks 11-13 (sounds and phonology): Sound perception, speech errors, categorical perception. 

\- Weeks 14-15: Review, term paper preparation, presentations.

\- Week 16: Term paper due.

grading.note: Presentation on the topic chosen for the term paper

prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
